headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: benchmark_custom_audience_id
parameters.description: The ID of the custom audience that you select as the benchmark audience. Note : The audience ID that you input here must be accessible by your advertiser ID. Otherwise, an error will occur.

parameters.name: comparison_custom_audience_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the custom audience that you select as the comparison audience. Max size: 4. Note : The audience IDs that you input here must be accessible by your advertiser ID. Otherwise, an error will occur.

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

top_fields.name: data
top_fields.description: Returned Data. Note : Audience sizes fewer than 1,000 will not be displayed.

fields.name: targetable_users_count_range
fields.description: The size range of users in the custom audience who have been active in the last 30 days and can be targeted.

fields.name: comparison_audiences
fields.description: Comparison audience data. Returned if you have input comparison_custom_audience_ids in your request.

fields.name: targetable_users_count_range
fields.description: The size range of users in the custom audience who have been active in the last 30 days and can be targeted.

fields.name: benchmark_overlap_rate
fields.description: The base percentage of users from the benchmark audience that are available in the comparison audience.

fields.name: benchmark_overlap_rate_range
fields.description: The percentage range of users from the benchmark audience that are available in the comparison audience.

fields.name: benchmark_overlap_count_range
fields.description: The size range of users from the benchmark audience that are available in the comparison audience.
